long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No more tedious, outdated manually written SOPs - just accurate process documentation in minutes, not hours. Purpose-built for financial services process teams.

The Fluency browser extension enables users to click record, complete their browser-based process, and instantly generate comprehensive, accurate, and production-ready process documentation. From reconciling payments to managing compliance workflows, the platform captures every action with context-aware precision, ensuring documentation is both detailed and immediately useable.

The intelligent capture technology understands context and user actions, creating clear, step-by-step documentation that requires minimal editing. Built-in editing tools streamline any necessary customisation.

Processes are stored securely in an AWS-powered process vault, with flexible export options available. Role-based controls enable optimal organisation and governance, establishing a central hub for process documentation and oversight.

Transform organisational operations with standardised, audit-ready process documentation. Centralise processes and gain valuable workflow insights, all with a click of a button in the browser.
